bibl.title: Catalogue of Greek and Latin Literary Papyri in Berlin (P. Berol. Inv. 21101-21299, 21911). (Berliner Klassikertexte. IX.)
bibl.note: Description and transcription of 206 published and unpublished texts (known authors, adespota, Biblical and Christian).
IOANNIDOU Grace (Edited by) and Margarete BÜSING (Photographs by), Catalogue of Greek and Latin Literary Papyri in Berlin (P. Berol. Inv. 21101-21299, 21911). (Berliner Klassikertexte. IX.)
Mainz am Rhein, Ph. von Zabern, 1996, 4°, xviii-267 pp. et 83 pll. ISBN 3-8053-1721-2. DM 196.
